refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert an OPML subscription list to a feed2imap config file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: feed2imap-opmlimport reads an OPML subscription list on standard input and outputs a feed2imap configuration file on standard output. The resulting configuration file will require some tweaking.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: Should probably accept parameters to be able to change default values.
